name: @simbachain/web3-suites
description: common code for web3 suite plugins. Code in this repo can be used for truffle or hardhat, but is designed to be applicable to future web3 suite plugins as well.

scripts.truffletest: cd src/tests/truffle/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './**/*.ts'
scripts.trufflecleantest: npm run cleantest && npm run truffletest && npm run cleantest
scripts.truffleunittest: cd src/tests/truffle/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './keycloak_handler/unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.trufflecleanunittest: npm run cleantest && npm run truffleunittest
scripts.truffleintegrationtest: cd src/tests/truffle/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './keycloak_handler/integration/**/*.ts'
scripts.trufflecleanintegrationtest: npm run cleantest && npm run truffleintegrationtest
scripts.hardhattest: cd src/tests/hardhat/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './**/*.ts'
scripts.hardhatcleantest: npm run cleantest && npm run hardhattest && npm run cleantest
scripts.hardhatunittest: cd src/tests/hardhat/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './azure_handler/unit/**/*.ts'
scripts.hardhatcleanunittest: npm run cleantest && npm run hardhatunittest
scripts.hardhatintegrationtest: cd src/tests/hardhat/ && env TS_NODE_COMPILER_OPTIONS='{"module": "commonjs" }' mocha -r ts-node/register './azure_handler/integration/**/*.ts'
scripts.hardhatcleanintegrationtest: npm run cleantest && npm run hardhatintegrationtest
scripts.test: npm run cleantest && npm run truffletest && npm run hardhattest && npm run cleantest
scripts.allcleantests: npm run cleantest && npm run truffletest && npm run hardhattest && npm run cleantest

author: SIMBA Chain
